group_1.textLeft: It was delicious!
It's time to close the restaurant!@Alright, let's clean up!

group_1.textRight: ...Why are you still here after closing@like it's natural?

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it!
I made sure to let my mom know that I@didn't need dinner!
Umm, didn't you know that I got permission@from your dad?
Mmm...aren't you being too cold?@I'm here to help you clean up!

group_1.textRight: What you're really after is some leftovers,@aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe...@You got me.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm glad I don't have to throw away@the ingredients.
But I don't think it'll sit right with me if you@keep sponging off me like this every time...

group_1.textLeft: Manakaaa!@Let me eat! I'm starving!

group_1.textRight: Okay, okay!@Please eat as much as you want!
In return, you'll have to help me clean up@the mess!

group_1.textLeft: Yes!

group_1.narration: *Munch Munch Munch Munch*@*Munch Munch Munch Munch*

group_1.textLeft: Mmm, th-this is...!
[chara:302401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's so delicious, my heart...@My heart is going to stop...!
Ummm...I think there may be a little@consomm√© taste?
The ingredients for the preparation...onions?@It feels like something different than usual.

group_1.textRight: ...Your sense of taste is the same as ever,@I only changed it a bit.

group_1.textLeft: This is delicious, but it might not@go well with your cooking.
Ahhh, but this is the best...! I want to drink it@first thing in the morning when I wake up!
You're really amazing...@Your food is getting better every day...

group_1.textRight: ...About half of it is thanks to you.

group_1.textLeft: Really!@[chara:302401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302401:cheek_0][chara:302401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_400][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]Yay!
My advice is helping!

group_1.textRight: (Whenever food is involved,@you always look so happy and content...)

group_1.textLeft: O-oh...?@Why are you silent?
Was my advice meddlesome...?

group_1.textRight: Your advice has been very helpful.
But I don't think one or two pieces@of advice are enough to make me better...

group_1.textLeft: Then what do you mean, thanks to me?

group_1.textRight: Just having someone who sincerely says@it tastes good...

group_1.textLeft: I see...!
Well then, I'll do my best to keep telling you@how delicious it is!

group_1.textRight: Tsumugi, half of what you originally say@is "delicious"!

group_1.textLeft: Because your cooking is really delicious!
What is it, Manaka?

group_1.textRight: ...From now on, I'm going to make you eat my@cooking so much that you'll get sick of it.

group_1.textLeft: Ohhh, yay!
I would eat as much of your cooking@as I could...
Don't hesitate to feed me lots@of delicious food!

group_1.textCenter: I'm so happy to be able to eat@delicious food every day...!
